title: Muttiah Muralitharan
summary: Deshabandu Muttiah Muralitharan (Tamil: முத்தையா முரளிதரன், Sinhala: මුත්තයියා මුරලිදරන් also spelt Muralidaran; born 17 April 1972) is a Sri Lankan cricket coach, former professional cricketer, businessman and a member of the ICC Cricket Hall of Fame. Averaging over 6 wickets per test match, Murali is regarded as the greatest and most successful bowler ever to play international cricket. He is the only bowler to take 800 test wickets and 530+ ODI wickets. As of October 2021, he has taken more wickets in international cricket than any other bowler.[4]
